name: Episode 14
desc: Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife.

name: Episode 15
desc: Chakraborthy dada is all set to direct his new film and is very anxious to know whether the things are going the right way or not. Chintu narrates Prema why he was punished by his teacher and request Prema to act as his mother in front of his teacher. Watch this interesting episode to know what happens when Chintu's real mother finds out.Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife.

name: Episode 16
desc: Keshav is disgusted to hear that Koki's mother Bhaumati is arriving. Prema's father, Captain Sher Singh, too, co-incidentally arrives at the gate with Bhaumati. Seeing each other at the gate, both Prema's father and Koki's mother fall in love. Watch the entire episode to enjoy this hilarious episode.Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife.

name: Episode 17
desc: Prema tells Keshav that one of Sharma's friends has proposed to show her a flat in which she wants to move in. Hearing this, Keshav becomes sad thinking that he and Prema would part. Once again, he seeks Gokhale's help in the matter. In order to help his friend Keshav, Gokhale gives him an idea to convince Prema that the new flat is haunted by ghosts, hence, stopping her from shifting. Watch this humorous episode to find what happens next.Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife.

name: Episode 18
desc: In his desperation of becoming a father, Dilruba carries a doll with him and treats it like his own child. This idea worries Prema that if she becomes a mother then her chances in the film industry would be minimized. Dada suggests Prema pretend to be a pregnant woman in real life. Watch this rib-tickling episode to find out what happens when Dilruba discovers the truth.Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife.

name: Episode 19
desc: Initially, Keshav is excited about his interview, where he is expected to be promoted. Though Keshav successfully passes the interview and gets the job, but this happiness comes with a cost. If he accepts the offer, he needs to relocate to a different house. What will Keshav do now? Watch this episode to enjoy Keshav's dilemma.Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife.

name: Episode 20
desc: Dilruba does not agree with Prema that Keshav is a gentleman. Dilruba pledges to expose the reality of Keshav in front of Prema. Dilruba makes a plan and tells Jwala (who is a side-heroine in Prema's movie) to help him out, in showing that Keshav is a person who flirts with other ladies. Will Keshav fall into Dilruba's trap? Stay tuned.

name: Episode 21
desc: Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife.

name: Episode 22
desc: Ganga Mausi comes to Kokila and tells her about Prema Shalini's parceling for the slum area people. Keshav reaches the venue and praises Prema's initiative for the slum people's rights. On the other hand, Dilruba teases Prema by eating food in front of her. However, Keshav assures Prema to give her food. What will happen next? Watch this humorous show to find out.Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife.

name: Episode 23
desc: Keshav makes a joke while Kokila asks him about what would be his reaction after her death. Ganga Mausi takes Kokila and Chintu along with her to a Tirth Yatra (pilgrimage). As per the planning, Ganga Mausi calls Keshav and tells her that Kokila is no more. What will be Keshav's reaction to know about his wife's death? Watch this funny episode to find out more.Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife.

name: Episode 24
desc: When Dilruba is exercising, Prema Shalini comments on him which makes him feel depressed. Prema takes Dilruba along with her for jogging, where Dilruba requests a security guard to make him a perfectly fit man. Watch this interesting episode to know what struggles Dilruba comes across in his new endeavor.Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife.

name: Episode 25
desc: Kokila, who is need of a maid servant, requests Ganga Mausi, who tells that she will send a maid servant at her home. Later, Dilruba arrives at Kokila's house disguised as a maid and does all the household chores at Kokila's house. What will Keshav do when he finds Dilruba disguised as a maid? Watch to find out.Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife.

name: Episode 26
desc: Keshav is angry as his day has started on a bad note. When he reaches his office, he speaks to his juniors arrogantly. Meanwhile, Gokhle tries to make him understand about his behavior, and tells him to apologize to his juniors in the office. On the other hand, Kokila along with Ganga Mausi go to an astrologer's place, where he informs them that Keshav may kill someone. Watch this extremely funny episode to know what Kokila does to stop Keshav.Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife.

name: Episode 27
desc: When Prema gives an interview to the news reporters, Keshav intervenes. Before Prema could complete her interview, reporters notice Urvashi, who used to be Prema's side actress. Reporters leave Prema's interview incomplete and move on to interview Urvashi. Prema feels insulted and jealous as Urvashi is a bigger star now. Will Prema do something wrong out of jealousy? Watch to find out.Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife.

name: Episode 28
desc: Dilruba asks Prema about her reaction if he ever gets kidnapped. Later when Dilruba goes to Prema's shooting venue, he gets abducted by a person named Kala Kauwa. The kidnapper calls Prema regarding the extortion money but Prema takes it lightly, believing it to be a prank. What will happen further? Watch to find out.Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife.

name: Episode 29
desc: While Kokila is searching a job in the newspaper, Keshav comments on her. Even after this, Kokila reaches at the job site, but she unknowingly enters a production house. In the mean time, she is offered rupees five lakh for a movie and she is assured that she would be working with Prema Shalini. What will Kokila do now? Will she accept this offer or not? Watch this hilarious episode to know more.Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife.

name: Episode 30
desc: Prema argues with Dliruba and throws him out of the house. Later, a lawyer comes to Prema's house and tells that her deceased grandfather has left 25 lakh rupees for her. But at the same time, he puts a condition in front of her that she will be able to get the money only if she shows Gurunathji that both, Dilruba and Prema, are living a better life. What will Prema do now to get the money? Watch the humorous episode to find out.Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife.

name: Episode 31
desc: Ganga Mausi tells Keshav that somebody hypnotized her daughter and stole all her ornaments. Later, Gokhale takes Keshav to Barabandi to learn the skill of hypnotism so that he can hypnotize Prema Shalini. Watch Keshav go through Barabandi's annoying methods to learn the art of hypnotism in this rib-tickling episode.Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife.

name: Episode 32
desc: Prema Shalini questions Kuki about the thought process of a woman behind her cooking. Prema tells her that if she gets an award for her acting then she would credit her for that. Keshav enters and tells Prema to share some time with him too. Prema Shalini tells Keshav that he is too old to be spent with. Watch this funny episode to know more.Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife.

name: Episode 33
desc: Dilruba requests Kuki to run away with him. When Prema Shalini asks Dilruba about it, Dilruba replies that Kuki was his fiancÃ©e, Gowri, in the previous birth. He pleads Prema not to separate him from Kuki. Watch this exciting episode to know what happens next.Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife.

name: Episode 100
desc: Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife.

name: Episode 101
desc: Dilruba and Prema Shalini are worried because of the water leakage in their house due to rain. Keshav enters Prema Shalini's house where Prema tells him about her house's bad condition. She also tells him that if he fails to get her house repaired, then she will come to his house. Hearing this, Keshav gets happy. Watch the entire show to know more.Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife.

name: Episode 102
desc: Keshav scolds Chintu for making fun of him. Further, Ganga Mausi arrives and informs about the water cyclone which is going to hit the entire world. Later, Keshav tells about this cyclone to his boss, Sharma. He also demands for the promotion and tells that until and unless he gets the promotion he will not do any work in the office. Watch this show to know more.Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife.

name: Episode 103
desc: Chintu tells his parents Koki and Keshav to fight quietly and tells them that both Dilruba and Prema are listening to him secretly. Later, Koki dresses up as a top executive and visits Keshav's office. Watch the entire episode to know more.Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife.

name: Episode 104
desc: Prema Shalini faces an accident on the sets and faints. On the other hand, Keshav comes to know that Sharma is the reason behind Prema's accident and gets angry. On the other hand, doctor tells Dilruba that Prema has lost her memory. Watch the entire episode to know more.Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife.

name: Episode 105
desc: Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife.

name: Episode 106
desc: Prema Shalini gets a call from a TV channel called "No TV" and gets happy as she has got an offer from that channel to work, meanwhile Dilruba tries to tease her. Later, Dilruba meets Keshav, where he tells him to write dialogues for Prema Shalini's new serial. Listening to this, Keshav feels happy. Watch this show to know more.Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife.

name: Episode 107
desc: Chintu makes Keshav angry by continuously irritating him. Later, Keshav goes to Prema Shalini's house and tells her to be cautious as a thief has entered in their society. After this, police arrests the thief but before he leaves the place, the thief gives a curse to Keshav that he will start stealing things. Watch this show to know more.Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife.

name: Episode 108
desc: An astrologer goes to Prema Shalini's house and tells her that he would predict her future by reading her face. The astrologer makes fun of Dilruba and indulges in an argument with him. Later, Keshav goes to his office wearing a lungi and his boss Sharma makes fun of him. Watch the entire episode to know more.Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife. Keshav Kulkarni (Jatin Kanakia) and his wife Kokila's (Reema Lagoo) life changes when popular film actress Prema Shalini (Archana Puran Singh) comes to live in their neighborhood with Dilruba (Rakesh Bedi), her effeminate husband. Keshav, who has always desired of a glamorous life partner, gets attracted to Prema. On the other hand, Dilruba finds Kokila's intelligence to be attractive. Watch these men fail in their funny attempts to impress each others' wife.

name: Episode 109
desc: Kokila tells Keshav about her uncle's photo in newspaper, as he has become a leader of a political party. Meanwhile, Keshav challenges that he will get his name printed in the newspaper within two days. Also, Kokila tells him that if he fails to do that, then he will have to do whatever she orders him. Watch this funny episode to know more.Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife.

name: Episode 110
desc: Keshav asks Koki that why is Chintu wearing sunglasses, and Koki tells Keshav that Chintu is affected with conjunctivitis. Prema asks her husband Dilruba that how would she bathe in the absence of a soap and Dilruba tells her to use washing detergent in place of a soap. Watch the entire episode to know more.Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife.

name: Episode 111
desc: Keshav tells Koki that Ganga would have been his step mother in his previous birth. On the other hand, Prema Shalini tells Dilruba that she fears seeing television due to the old classics which get telecast. Koki tells Sharma that she wants Keshav to look for an interior designer. Watch the entire episode to know more.Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife.

name: Episode 112
desc: An astrologer advises Prema Shalini to leave the house and tells her that success is not possible for her if she continues living in the same house. Later, Keshav comes to know this and tells Prema to interchange her house with his. Watch the entire episode to know more.Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife.

name: Episode 113
desc: Keshav tries to teach Chintu geography for his exams. Koki comes and tells Keshav that she wants Chintu to pass in the exams and if she teaches him, then he would not pass. Later, Ganga Mausi comes to Koki and tells her that she wants to watch television in her house. Watch the entire episode to know more.Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife.

name: Episode 114
desc: Koki tells Dilruba that they met co-incidentally. To this, Dilruba tells Koki that he saw her going downstairs and came to meet her. Keshav tells Gokhale that he would give an advertisement in paper to keep a lady paying guest in his house. Watch the entire episode to know more.Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife.

name: Episode 115
desc: Chintu informs Keshav that Ganga is about to come, but is unwell. Later Ganga comes and tells Koki that she can show her the future and tells that Dilruba would become a beggar in the year two thousand and five. Later, Dilruba goes to Koki and asks her about Ganga's prediction. Watch the entire episode to know more.Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife. Keshav Kulkarni (Jatin Kanakia) and his wife Kokila's (Reema Lagoo) life changes when popular film actress Prema Shalini (Archana Puran Singh) comes to live in their neighborhood with Dilruba (Rakesh Bedi), her effeminate husband. Keshav, who has always desired of a glamorous life partner, gets attracted to Prema. On the other hand, Dilruba finds Kokila's intelligence to be attractive. Watch these men fail in their funny attempts to impress each others' wife.

name: Episode 116
desc: Media questions Prema Shalini about her preparations for her latest film, and she explains it all to them. On the other hand, Keshav tells Gokhale that it is not possible to find Prema's mother and she would not be able to recognize even her mother. Watch the entire episode to know more.Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife.

name: Episode 117
desc: Prema tells her producer that she is ready for the outdoor shoot and demands for the address. Prema tells Dilruba that the producer wants to take her to Khooni Haveli and would have to stay there without the unit. Dilruba, too, refuses to go with Prema. Watch the entire episode to know more.Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife.

name: Episode 118
desc: Prema advises Dilruba to learn English before speaking it. On the other hand, Gokhale brings a magazine to Keshav consisting of Prema Shalini's interview. Later, Keshav goes to Prema's office and tells her that he would help her and her NGO. Watch the entire episode to know more.Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife. Keshav Kulkarni (Jatin Kanakia) and his wife Kokila's (Reema Lagoo) life changes when popular film actress Prema Shalini (Archana Puran Singh) comes to live in their neighborhood with Dilruba (Rakesh Bedi), her effeminate husband. Keshav, who has always desired of a glamorous life partner, gets attracted to Prema. On the other hand, Dilruba finds Kokila's intelligence to be attractive. Watch these men fail in their funny attempts to impress each others' wife.

name: Episode 119
desc: Gokhale tells Keshav that their boss Sharma is disturbed due to his sister-in-law. On the other hand, Sharma tells Keshav that his sister-in-law Mamta wants to become a heroine and wants to meet Prema. Sharma tells Keshav to help Mamta meet Prema. Watch the entire episode to know more.Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife.

name: Episode 120
desc: Koki tells Keshav that she and Chintu were appreciating him. Keshav tells his son Chintu that he was a goon in his college days and people used to fear him a lot. Chintu tells Keshav that he fought with a local kid because he called Keshav a coward. name: Episode 126
desc: Keshav buys some stale vegetables from the vendor and while he leaves the place, suddenly a Baba calls him with his name. Watch this show to know more.Shrimaan Shrimati, a famous sitcom by Adhikari Brothers, reflects the notion of loving one's neighbor's wife. Keshav Kulkarni (Jatin Kanakia) and his wife Kokila's (Reema Lagoo) life changes when popular film actress Prema Shalini (Archana Puran Singh) comes to live in their neighborhood with Dilruba (Rakesh Bedi), her effeminate husband. Keshav, who has always desired of a glamorous life partner, gets attracted to Prema. On the other hand, Dilruba finds Kokila's intelligence to be attractive. Watch these men fail in their funny attempts to impress each others' wife.
